name: Brown Planthopper
remedy: Maintain field water, apply recommended insecticides, introduce predator spiders

name: Fall Armyworm
symptoms: Leaf scraping, window panes, whorl feeding
remedy: Hand picking egg masses, pheromone traps, biocontrol with Trichogramma, selective insecticides

name: Bollworm
remedy: Pheromone traps, release parasitoids, Bt sprays, rotate chemicals

name: Aphids
remedy: Neem oil, ladybird beetles, systemic insecticides if severe
